description: Creates or updates the workspace permissions assignment in a given account and workspace for the specified principal.

principal_id.description: The ID of the user, service principal, or group.

permissions.description: Note that excluding this field, or providing unsupported values, will have the same effect as providing an empty list, which will result in the deletion of all permissions for the principal.

principal.description: Information about the principal assigned to the workspace.

user_name.description: The username of the user. Present only if the principal is a user.

group_name.description: The group name of the group. Present only if the principal is a group.

service_principal_name.description: The name of the service principal. Present only if the principal is a service principal.

principal_id.description: The unique, opaque id of the principal.

display_name.description: The display name of the principal.

permissions.description: The permissions level of the principal.

error.description: Error response associated with a workspace permission assignment, if any.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
